title: Evidence-Based Online Instructional Design Workshop for Adult Learners

context.additional_context: Basic language learning support program to address the digital divide post-COVID-19.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic functions of online learning platforms with 90% accuracy
Learners can create weekly planners for self-directed learning
Learners can explain three strategies to enhance language learning effectiveness in digital environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
